nodes.text: Brogar's Safe House, also known as simply Brogar's, was a combined cantina and safe house operated on Lok by Brogar following the Sith–Imperial War. The neutrality of the area was widely respected by the underworld.
It was there that Cade Skywalker captured gambler Naxy Screeger and Jedi Hosk Trey'lis. Both were staying at the safe house until they could find passage offworld.
